com.facebook.buck.parser.spec

Class BuildFileSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.parser.spec.BuildFileSpec

  • public abstract class BuildFileSpec
extends Object
    A specification used by the parser, via TargetNodeSpec, to match build files.
